biography.place-of-birth: Near Resolute Bay, Northwest Territories, Canada

connections.group-affiliation: God Squad; formerly Alpha Flight, Eskimo Gods, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, The Flight
connections.relatives: Hodiak (grandfather), Nelvanna (mother), Richard Lawrence Easton (father, deceased), Michael Twoyoungmen (Shaman, foster father), Douglas Thompson (husband, deceased), unnamed son (deceased)
